column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Visited for the first time last night and absolutely loved everything
column2: we can't wait to go back! Though I may be biased because I love this style of eating
column3: their tapas options are superb. We ordered a wide variety
column5: but our favorites were the Beef Empanada
column6: Goat Cheese baked in tomato sauce
column7: and Chorizo wrapped dates. We also tried a pitcher of each
column9: and I preferred the white while my girlfriend and our friend liked the red. In my opinion
column10: this place is perfect for a date night or a small group gathering to enjoy some conversation and Sangria while different plates come scattered throughout your stay. To add
column11: the prices are very good for the quality of food you're experiencing. I definitely recommend this spot!
